message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I value your offer, I'm looking for a price closer to $11,500. This reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $9,000 is the maximum I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
